price: Kwanini hamuirudishi hiyo roho, ikiwa nyinyi mnasema kweli?
footnotes: Mrudishieni roho yake huyo aliye kabiliwa na mauti ikiwa nyinyi mwasema kweli kwamba nyinyi mnazo nguvu na hamshindwi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
